Which statements are true regarding Akshay Kumar and the film 'Laxmmi Bomb'?
Options:
A. A) Akshay Kumar starred in the song 'Burj Khalifa'.
B. B) 'Laxmmi Bomb' is a remake of Kanchana (2011).
C. C) 'Laxmmi Bomb' is a horror comedy-genre film.
D. D) Akshay Kumar filmed 'Burj Khalifa' in India.
Correct Answer: A) Akshay Kumar starred in the song 'Burj Khalifa'., B) 'Laxmmi Bomb' is a remake of Kanchana (2011)., C) 'Laxmmi Bomb' is a horror comedy-genre film.
